title: Yuri Hime Wildrose
description:
Collections of erotic GL one-shots.

[u]Volume 1[/u]: [spoiler]
► Suki Tokidoki Kiss
► Ichiban Sukina Hito, by Tokitsukaze Otoha
► Arcadia ~Flowers of Paradise~
► Girls' Union, by Morishima Akiko ([url=https://mangadex.org/manga/14473]Onnanoko Awase[/url])
► From Your L-I-P-S, by Jounouchi Nene
► Hao!, by Chi-Ran
► The Greenhouse Witch
► Sweet Little Devil, by Nanzaki Iku
► Blue, by Hayase Hashiba
Contains a Yuri Hime Art Collection
[/spoiler]

[u]Volume 2[/u]: [spoiler]
► Greenhouse Secret, by Mikuni Hajime
► Girls Study, by Harumi Chihiro
► Keep Your Heart Closed, by Rokuroichi
► Bounce and Sway, by Gyuunyuu Linda
► Sweet Little Devil: Heart and Soul, by Nanzaki Iku
► Love and SeX, by Chi-Ran
► Teacher's Pet, by Jounouchi Nene
► I want to be a cat, by Akiyoshi Nana
[/spoiler]

[u]Volume 3[/u]: [spoiler]
► Sweet, by Ootsuki Miu
► Whether Sleeping or Awake, by Mikuni Hajime
► The Great Closet Operation, by Takahashi Itsumi
► Sweet Sweet Honey, by Handa Mako
► Love Prep Room, by Nanzaki Iku
► Sweet Exercise, by Amano Shuninta
► Otonato Kodomoto, by Izumiya Otoha
► Time, by Hayase Hashiba
► Maiden Repository, by Serio Yuzuha
[/spoiler]

[u]Volume 4[/u]: [spoiler]
► Is That Warming You Up?
► Only A Secret From Her
► My Girlfriend
► Christmas Eve Agape, by Morishima Akiko ([url=https://mangadex.org/manga/14473]Onnanoko Awase[/url])
► Our Future Plans
► I Love You My Girl
► Sugar Complex, by Aoki Mitsue
► Hana no Shishuu, Mitsu no Hari
[/spoiler]

[u]Volume 5[/u]: [spoiler]
► Love Potion
► Sweet Girls
► Osoroi
► Doctor, Stop!
► I Don't Know if This is Love
► Slave to Love, by Morishima Akiko ([url=https://mangadex.org/manga/14473]Onnanoko Awase[/url])
► Blushing Girl
► Bed Made Matenai!
► Promise
► Your Love, by Momono Moto ([url=https://mangadex.org/manga/14867]True True[/url])
► Sweet Examination, by Amano Shuninta
[/spoiler]

[u]Volume 6[/u]: [spoiler]
► Dream Story
► Gravity, by Momono Moto ([url=https://mangadex.org/manga/14867]True True[/url])
► Honey Inferno
► After School Berry Girl, by Saida Nika
► Five-second Love, by Serio Yuzuha
► The Fragrant Sea Breeze, Morishima Akiko  ([url=https://mangadex.org/manga/14473]Onnanoko Awase[/url])
► Love the world
► Moment Like Fireworks
► Natsu no Ojou-san-tachi
► Bed de Muchuu
[/spoiler]

[u]Volume 7[/u]: [spoiler]
► Partners, by Saburouta
► Unfaithful Woman, by Ootomo Megane
► Hidden in Dusk, by Momono Moto ([url=https://mangadex.org/manga/14867]True True[/url])
► At Dusk in my Room, by Rokuroichi
► Encore!!!, by Amano Shuninta
► Summer Day, by Kurata Uso
► From Tomorrow On No More Drinking, by Chisako  ([url=https://mangadex.org/manga/23444]Dark Cherry to Shoujo A[/url])
► Shishunki Medical, by Kodama Naoko
[/spoiler]

[u]Volume 8[/u]: [spoiler]
► Your Fault, by Kuzushiro
► Milky, by Amano Shuninta
►Cubic Starship, by Kodama Naoko
►My Little Red Riding Hood, by Kawai Rou
[/spoiler]

Author/Artist not fitting into the fields: Ootsuki Miu, Ohsawa Yayoi
